summary: Some helpful additions and changes to Honeyside - Lore friendly
descriptionHtml:
*** To install - either download with manager and install when prompted, or download manually and drop Honeyside3.esp to your Program Files/Skyrim/Data folder.  Check to be sure the file is activated in the launcher before you start your game.***

You can use this mod and change it if you like, just ket me know and toss me some props if you do.  


5/29/12 - UPDATE
updates include:

*     trap door to Ragged Flagon Cistern for thieves guild members
*     new banners and decorations
*     several display cases
*     added storage to enchanting, blacksmith, and mannequin areas
*     Anvil, workbench, and sharpening wheel added to interior
*     new mage garden
*     fixed several bugs with lighting and decorations

_________________________________________________________________________________

This mod adds storage for alchemy, enchanting, and other various places, weapon plaques throughout the house, a small garden below the stairs, a crafting/smithing area above the stairs, candles to light up the dark corners and showcase the mannequins, various decorations, display cases for small items, and a trapdoor tunnel to the thieves guild.  Some items may still settle, even though they\'re not supposed to.  Mostly everything seems to stay put.  Bugs will be fixed as we go.
author: Ethical Infant
